1.title: Typing Speed Test
1.description: Online typing speed test to measure the typing speed of a user accurately.

2.title: Shopping Website
2.description: A shopping cart website where users can search for products, find their details and add or remove them from cart.

3.title: Github Explorer
3.description: A Github Explorer web app to search and explore github user profiles using data fetched from Github REST API. The page uses infinite scroll to display the list of repositories efficiently.

4.title: Tambola
4.description: Play the popular board game Tambola (Indian Bingo) with this fun and responsive random number generator with special messages for each number.

5.title: Movie Database
5.description: A Movie Database where users can browse movies and segragate them into separate lists. Movies can be searched with title or by genres.

6.title: Troublemaker - Coding Blocks
6.description: Added new features to Coding Blocks's MCQ Quiz generator portal.
